椱字的基本解释

椱
fù
织布机上卷布用的轴。

椱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fù］
［《廣韻》扶富切，去宥，奉。］
［《廣韻》房六切，入屋，奉。］
织机上卷丝织品的轴。

椱字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　椱； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页537第18
【廣韻】【集韻】?扶富切，浮去聲。【說文】作椱，機持繒者。　又【集韻】房六切，音復。義同。　又舄也。【揚子·方言】履中有木者謂之椱舄，自關而東謂之椱。椱字从?作。

椱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
椱字的起名意思

织布机上卷布用的轴。

椱
Basic explanation of words
椱
fù
The shaft used to roll cloth on a loom.
椱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fù］
["Guangyun" help the rich and cut, go to You, and Bong. ]
["Guangyun" room six cuts, enter the room, bong. ]
A shaft for winding silk fabric on a loom.
椱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　椱; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 537 18
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Help the rich and cut, floating to the sound. [Speaking of the text] The person who works with the machine and holds the machine.　[Jiyun] The room has six cuts, and the sound is complex. The same meaning.　Again. [Yangtze Dialect] Those who have wood in their shoes are called 椱舄, and they are called 椱褱 from Guan to the east. The word is written from?
